title: Leaders in Law and Community Fellowship Program Fund
description: To provide support for the Law School's Leaders in Law and Community (LILAC) Fellowship Program, including scholarships, compensation for faculty and staff, and other program expenses (travel, conferences, fellowships, supplies) at CU Boulder Law School.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Law School's Leaders in Law and Community (LILAC) Fellowship Program, including scholarships, compensation for faculty and staff, and other program expenses (travel, conferences, fellowships, supplies) at CU Boulder Law School.
